original_text: Ask now about the former days, long before your time, from the day God created human beings on the earth; ask from one end of the heavens to the other. Has anything so great as this ever happened, or has anything like it ever been heard of?
korean_text: 네가 있기 전 하나님이 사람을 세상에 창조하신 날부터 지금까지 지나간 날을 상고하여 보라 하늘 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 이런 큰 일이 있었느냐 이런 일을 들은 적이 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: Ask now about the former days
from the day God created human beings
ask from one end of the heavens
Has anything so great as this ever happened
sentences.korean_translation: 이처럼 위대한 일이 일어난 적이 있는가

sentences.original_text: or has anything like it ever been heard of
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그와 같은 것을 들어본 적이 있는가
